medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Headaches and visual field defects began towards the end of the second pregnancy. Symptoms worsened postpartum, after which new headaches occurred.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Oligomenorrhea of 6 years duration; significant past medical history not specified.
medical_history.family_history: Unremarkable for endocrine neoplasms or autoimmune conditions.
